name: 测试参数保存策略
code:
def generate_signals(df, params):
    # 简单的双均线策略示例
    short_period = params.get('short_period', 5)
    long_period = params.get('long_period', 20)
    
    df['short_ma'] = df['close_price'].rolling(window=short_period).mean()
    df['long_ma'] = df['close_price'].rolling(window=long_period).mean()
    
    # 生成交易信号
    df['signal'] = 0
    df.loc[df['short_ma'] > df['long_ma'], 'signal'] = 1  # 买入信号
    df.loc[df['short_ma'] < df['long_ma'], 'signal'] = -1  # 卖出信号
    
    # 生成持仓信号
    df['position'] = df['signal'].shift(1).fillna(0)
    
    return df
description: 测试策略参数保存功能的策略
